heroes.name: E_Water
heroes.ability: Continous recovery: When hp is below 15%, self-healing ability will be activated (recover 5% hp and stamina each turn until full), health recovery skill increases health by 10%.

heroes.name: E_Fire
heroes.ability: Rage: When hp is below 10%, all stats of dmg, critical rate increase by 50%.

heroes.name: E_Leaf
heroes.ability: Immunity: Immune to harmful statuses (except burn and freeze).

heroes.name: E_Ground
heroes.ability: Indomitable: Has a 10% chance to be immune to damage and restore hp equal to the amount of damage dealt by the opponent.
